title: Footer background to white while preserving banana theme readability

requirements.summary: Set the bottom bar (footer) background to white while keeping footer content legible and banana-themed, without affecting other sections.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer renders with a white background across the app.
Footer text and icons remain legible on the white background in both light and dark mode.
No other page sections (header, main content background) change as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Update the footer container styling to use a white background (e.g., Tailwind white token) instead of the current banana-light background, while keeping existing banana-themed borders and ensuring text/link/icon colors remain readable in both light and dark mode.
